text.en: Oṃ. May there be happiness and positivity!
text.en-trans: om delek su gyur chik

text.en: Awareness-holders of the three transmissions, my glorious guru,
text.en-trans: gyü sum rigdzin palden lama dang

text.en: Chosen deities, peaceful and wrathful, victorious buddhas and your heirs,
text.en-trans: yi dam zhitro gyalwa sé dangché

text.en: Warrior spirits, sky-faring ḍākinīs and oceanic hosts of guardians:
text.en-trans: pawo khandro tensung gyatsö tsok

text.en: Look upon me now with love, and be witness to this, my prayer!
text.en-trans: dak la tser gong mönpé pangpo dzö

text.en: You who bring the vital energy of benefit and happiness to all beings,
text.en-trans: malü kyegu pendé sok gi sö

text.en: Essence of the wisdom of the buddhas of past, present and future and their heirs,
text.en-trans: dü sum sé ché gyalwé tuk kyi chü

text.en: Sovereign of all Śākyamuni Buddha’s teachings, Longchenpa:
text.en-trans: yongdzok tubten ngadak longchenpa

text.en: May your stainless noble wisdom spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: drimé tuk zang dar zhing gyé gyur chik

text.en: The clear light of dharmatā is like the celestial sphere through which devas course —
text.en-trans: chönyi ösal zhingkham lha yi lam

text.en: By nature, utterly devoid of any adventitious stain,
text.en-trans: rangzhin lobur drimé rab tang zhing

text.en: And affording infinite opportunity for enlightened action:
text.en-trans: trinlé gokab muta mepé khyön

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Adornment of the wondrous, spontaneously perfect Dense Array,
text.en-trans: mejung lhündrub tukpo köpé gyen

text.en: Lord of all maṇḍalas throughout the whole infinity of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü rabjam kyilkhor kün gyi dak

text.en: Ground-like support for myriad warriors abiding on the bhūmis:
text.en-trans: sar né pawo bum gyi nyer tsö zhi

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In keeping with the pure and impure intentions of beings,
text.en-trans: dak dang ma dak drowé sampa zhin

text.en: You take on illusory forms, as if in a play, to train others,
text.en-trans: gang dul gyutrul drawé jogek gi

text.en: And captivate the stable minds of the fortunate:
text.en-trans: kalzang yi kyi tenpa trok jepé

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Learning and discernment, like the sun drawn by its seven green horses,1
text.en-trans: mang tö nampar jepé ta jang gi

text.en: Are concentrated in the magnifying lens of contemplation,
text.en-trans: lek drang sampé rinchen mé shel kham

text.en: To set aflame clear light of meditation, which burns so brightly:
text.en-trans: gompé ösal nangwa rab barwé

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the brilliant light of the sun of stability and learning,
text.en-trans: ten khé nyin mor jepé ö nang gi

text.en: A thousand petals of perfect discipline unfurl in bloom,
text.en-trans: yangdak trim kyi dab tong cher zhepé

text.en: To reveal the fresh honey-nectar of benefit and happiness:
text.en-trans: pendé drangtsi sarpé nyingpochen

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Not dispersed by the winds of flickering thought,
text.en-trans: gya gyü namtok lung gi miché ching

text.en: Pliancy, brought about through jewel-like bliss,
text.en-trans: shin jang dewé rinchen lé drubpa

text.en: Is here applied to the virtue of training of others:
text.en-trans: gang dul gé la kolwé khoryuk chen

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Clouds of exposition adorn the sky of Buddha’s teaching,
text.en-trans: tubten namkhé gyen gyur chepé trin

text.en: Wherein the lightning of perfect reasoning flashes and strikes,
text.en-trans: yangdak rikpé lok gi rab khyü ching

text.en: And a hundred thousand thunder-drums of poetry resound:
text.en-trans: nyen gyur tsompé yang nga bum dirwa

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Upon the white guardian elephant of unrivalled wisdom,
text.en-trans: drendral khyen rab sa sung karpö teng

text.en: You stand, your thousand eyes of omniscience utterly clear,
text.en-trans: sheja künkhyen chen tong namtra zhing

text.en: As you wield the vajra-weapon of effortless Atiyoga:
text.en-trans: tsolmé ati dorjé tsöncha chen

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: From the glaciers, whose nature is eightfold purity,
text.en-trans: rangzhin gyeden gang kyi ri sul lé

text.en: Flows the excellent stream that brings spiritual maturity,
text.en-trans: ongwé min jé nyal drö gyün zang gi

text.en: With its rites that cleanse impurity and defilement:
text.en-trans: ma dak nyepé dri trü choga khen

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: No mere imagining or projection of how things might be,
text.en-trans: tarnang chömé lo tsam mayinpar

text.en: This maṇḍala of basic space, in which environment and beings are pure,
text.en-trans: nöchü dakpa ying kyi kyilkhor du

text.en: And you, who are without rival, reveal it directly:
text.en-trans: ngönsum tönpé jepo da dralwa

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Without the need for tiring means of inspiring fourfold joy
text.en-trans: lungsem tsön du jukpé tsoldrub kyi

text.en: Based on the confined efforts of energy and mind,
text.en-trans: ga zhi ngön du jepé ngaldub lé

text.en: Here, clear light is revealed directly, just as it is:
text.en-trans: mayin ösal jizhin nangjé pé

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: All reliance upon intellectual reasoning involving analysis and speculation
text.en-trans: yichö tokgé rikpé cha zhak dang

text.en: And elaborate expressions of self-radiance from controlling wind-energy
text.en-trans: ché ching lung gi rang dang tröpé ta

text.en: Are pacified within the space of eternally pure, profound luminosity:
text.en-trans: nyerzhi döné kadak tingsal ying

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: This wondrous system, in which the unceasing nature of emptiness
text.en-trans: tongpé rangzhin gakmé lhündrub dön

text.en: Is perfectly complete within the present moment of awareness,
text.en-trans: mé dang chikpu chalwa chenpo ru

text.en: As spontaneous presence, absence, oneness and suffusion:
text.en-trans: danté shepar dzokpé mejung luk

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: This wondrous way of traversing paths and stages all at once,
text.en-trans: sherig zangtal nyukma machö dang

text.en: In which unimpeded awareness is left genuine and unaltered,
text.en-trans: döné trödral rikdang jazer bub

text.en: And unelaborate rigpa’s radiance is an array of rainbow-colored light:
text.en-trans: salam chikchar dzokpé nyurlam mé

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The nature of blissful awareness, in which saṃsāra and nirvāṇa are equal,
text.en-trans: khordé nyamnyi rangrig dechen tsal

text.en: Is expressed as loving concern for living beings, infinite in number,
text.en-trans: talé dro la jam tsé rangzhin du

text.en: And essence and expression are as inseparable as light and its radiance:
text.en-trans: ö dang özer jizhin dral mepé

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Threading together the jewels of study, reflection and meditation
text.en-trans: chokrer magyur do ngak zhungluk gya

text.en: For hundreds of traditions of sūtra and mantra, without bias,
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé rinchen sebu la

text.en: Makes an adornment to be worn by those with clarity of mind:
text.en-trans: tar du gyipa losal gulwé gyen

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The darkness that is dull meditation practiced three times a day,
text.en-trans: lün gom tün sum makrum münpé shé

text.en: And, likewise, the constellations of intellectual speculation,
text.en-trans: tokgé gyukar trengwa zilnön pé

text.en: Are here eclipsed by the brilliant moon of scripture and realization:
text.en-trans: lungtok chashé dzokpé ökar chen

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The approach to learning is vast, as broad as the sky itself,
text.en-trans: khepé ngang tsul namkhé khyön tar yang

text.en: Disciplined conduct is as pure as that of the noble elders,
text.en-trans: tsünpé tulzhuk pakpé neten zhin

text.en: And beneficial activity is aided by love’s great treasury:
text.en-trans: zangpö dzepa tsewé terchen drok

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Excellent explanations of Sūtra, Tantra and Mind2are like a jewel pinnacle,
text.en-trans: dogyü semdé lek shé norbü cha

text.en: Made clean and bright through wondrous scripture and reasoning,
text.en-trans: mejung lung dang rikpé jidor gyi

text.en: And set atop the banner heralding victory over existence and quiescence:
text.en-trans: sizhi gyaltsen tsemor gö dzepé

text.en: May the teachings of the Omniscient Victor spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the blessings of the unfailing truth of Buddha, Dharma and Saṅgha,
text.en-trans: chok sum lumé denpé jinlab dang

text.en: And the power, strength and capacity of oceans of oath-bound guardians of the teaching,
text.en-trans: tensung damchen gyatsö tutob nü

text.en: And, above all, through the force of my own pure intentions,
text.en-trans: khyepar dak gi lhaksam dakpé tü

text.en: May the points contained in this aspiration, swiftly and easily, come to pass!
text.en-trans: mön dön delak nyi du drub gyur chik
